successes.title: Tesla vs. Edison
successes.description: The War of Currents! 2-5 electricity innovators build routes, grow tech trees, and play the stock market in 20 minutes per player.

Pledges.description: Hooray! You generously support our use of gaming to shine more light on the hijinks of the early electric industry. The bad pun is mercifully free...
DAY 1 BACKER THANK YOU! 1 Copy of Tesla vs. Edison, sent to you ahead of later backers whose orders are being sent from the same fulfillment location. Includes all stretch goals. (MSRP: $60)
1 Copy of Tesla vs. Edison! Includes all stretch goals. (MSRP: $60)

DAY 1 BACKER THANK YOU, MAKE ROOM FOR MORE EARLY BIRDS! 1 Copy of Tesla vs. Edison, sent to you ahead of later backers whose orders are being sent from the same fulfillment location. Includes all stretch goals. (MSRP: $60)
2 Copies of Tesla vs. Edison! Includes all stretch goals. (MSRP: $120)
I GET MINE FIRST!!! 1 ADVANCE Copy of Tesla vs. Edison! Includes all stretch goals. (MSRP: unavailable to general public)

We get advance copies of the game as a final production step, a couple months before the container would arrive at fulfillment. We'll pay for extra copies of these, and we'll pay to air ship them into your hot little hands!
